#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
ll int a[10010];
ll int mysum(ll int n)
{
	return (n*(n+1))>>1;
}
int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	cin.tie(NULL);
	ll int test;
	cin>>test;
	while(test--)
	{
		ll int n,k;
		cin>>n>>k;
		ll int i,r,l;
		a[0]=0;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>a[i];
		}
		sort(a,a+n);
		ll int mc=0,ans=0;
		for(i=(n-1);i>=0;i--)
		{
			mc++;
			while((i-1)>=0 && a[i-1]==a[i])
			{
				mc++;
				i--;
			}
			if(mc*(a[i]-a[i-1])<k)
			{
				ans+=(mc*(mysum(a[i]) - mysum(a[i-1])));
				k-=mc*(a[i]-a[i-1]);
			}
			else
			{
				l=(k/mc);
				r=k%mc;
				ans+=mc*(mysum(a[i]) -mysum(a[i]-l)) + (r * (a[i]-l));
				k=0;
				break;
			}
		}
		cout<<ans<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
